programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: A guided tour across the universe on a space ship made of art and sound. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: News from around the space industry, around the globe....and so much more. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Welcome to Space Channel Universe! Bringing you the highlights of latest news, entertainment, launch coverage and so much more! Sit back and enjoy Space Channel Universe. Duration: 7200

programme.title: TrailerPalooza
programme.desc: Our favorite space movies from the big screen to streaming, must see films for your inner space nerd. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: Space Channel Nightside Edition News is a nightly news program that airs from 6pm to 8pm and covers the latest stories from the space community, from updates on the latest missions and spacecraft launches to interviews with industry leaders about the future of space exploration Duration: 7200

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: The stories we're covering today, that will affect our lives tomorrow. Deep Space Technologies, the SCOUT mission, Cosmic Shielding and more... Duration: 3600

programme.title: TrailerPalooza
programme.desc: The latest trailers from outer space Duration: 3600

programme.title: The Ultimate Penthouse
programme.desc: Space Tourist takes us out of this world to a company making plans to build a hotel in space as well as those closer to home. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Monolith Monsters
programme.desc: Rocks from a meteor grows and threatens a sleepy Southwestern desert community. It must be stopped or Los Angeles is in big trouble! Duration: 5400

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Kronos
programme.desc: Aliens from another world send a huge robotic accumulator to invade the Earth. It absorbs all energy it comes in contact with. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: Take a journey into the beyond with Walter Lloyd and the After Dark crew Duration: 14400

programme.title: AFTER DARK
programme.desc: If so, AFTER DARK is for you. Join Walter Lloyd on an intimate tour of the cosmos, right from your bed...at night. Duration: 14400
